title: SOLD: 1907 Dietsche Ty Cobb Batting PSA 3
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1907 Dietsche Ty Cobb Batting PSA 3
posts.post_content:
The nicest PSA 3 you'll ever see, it's got sharp corners and nearly perfect borders.  Has some scrapbook hinge marks which bring it down in grade, otherwise the card is in excellent condition.  Accepting offers.

[img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/49243274261_4f1a4803de_z.jpg[/img]
Jeff---Beautiful Postcard---I think it certainly would help if you put a sell price with it.--I will give it a shot with a price of $7500.--thanks,  Don
